alert.note: Alert for Ben Hill; Berrien; Colquitt; Cook; Irwin; Tift; Turner; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued February 11 at 3:13PM EST until February 12 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of Big Bend Florida and Georgia, including the following areas, in Big Bend Florida, Coastal Franklin, Coastal Jefferson, Coastal Taylor, Coastal Wakulla, Gadsden, Inland Franklin, Inland Jefferson, Inland Taylor, Inland Wakulla, Leon, Liberty and Madison. In Georgia, Ben Hill, Berrien, Brooks, Colquitt, Cook, Grady, Irwin, Lanier, Lowndes, Thomas, Tift, Turner and Worth. * WHEN...Through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - An additional 1 to 2 inches of rainfall are forecast through tonight with isolated higher amounts across the Watch area. The most vulnerable locations are in southwest Georgia and the Florida Big Bend near the state line. Flash flooding is possible from training storms or where rainfall accumulates in a short period of time. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Ben Hill; Berrien; Colquitt; Cook; Irwin; Tift; Turner; Worth
